description: Manages the data attributes required for the full Know Your Customer due diligence process.

attributes.name: legal_entity_name
attributes.description: The official registered name of the legal entity as it appears in corporate registry documents.

generationExamples.prompt: Check if the entity name contains restricted words
generationExamples.response: RULE "Check-Entity-Name" IF legal_entity_name CONTAINS 'Bank' AND NOT licensed_as_bank THEN ALERT 'Entity name suggests banking activity but no banking license'

ui.label: Legal Entity Name
ui.helpText: Enter the exact name as registered with corporate authorities

wizard.title: Entity Information
wizard.description: Provide basic information about the legal entity

KYC.description: The legal name used for regulatory compliance and customer identification. Must match incorporation documents exactly for AML verification.

generationExamples.prompt: Verify the entity name matches the incorporation documents

FundAccounting.description: The entity name used for fund accounting statements and investor reporting. Used in NAV calculations and shareholder communications.

attributes.name: ubo_full_name
attributes.description: The full legal name of the Ultimate Beneficial Owner, as defined by AML regulations.

generationExamples.prompt: Check if the beneficial owner's name matches 'John Smith'.
generationExamples.response: RULE "Match-UBO-Name" IF ubo_full_name == 'John Smith' THEN SET match_found = true

KYC.description: The name of the individual who ultimately owns or controls the client entity. Must be screened against sanctions and PEP lists for AML compliance.

generationExamples.prompt: We need to screen the beneficial owner's name against the sanctions list.
generationExamples.response: SCREEN Entity 'ubo_full_name' AGAINST Source 'SanctionsList' RETURN screening_result

FundAccounting.description: The registered shareholder's name, used for calculating capital distributions and generating shareholder statements.

generationExamples.prompt: Calculate the dividend payment for this shareholder based on their holdings.
generationExamples.response: DERIVE dividend_payment USING CalculateDividend WITH ubo_full_name, share_count

attributes.name: sanctions_screening_result
attributes.description: The result of sanctions screening performed against global watchlists.

generationExamples.prompt: Create a rule to handle confirmed sanctions matches
generationExamples.response: RULE "Sanctions-Match" IF sanctions_screening_result == 'CONFIRMED_MATCH' THEN BLOCK_ONBOARDING AND ALERT 'Sanctions match detected'

attributes.name: risk_score
attributes.description: Computed risk score based on multiple risk factors, ranging from 1 (low risk) to 100 (high risk).
attributes.rules_dsl: DERIVE risk_score FROM country_risk_rating * 0.3 + business_risk_rating * 0.4 + ubo_risk_rating * 0.3

ui.label: Risk Score
ui.helpText: Automatically calculated based on risk factors

generationExamples.prompt: Create a rule for high-risk clients that require additional due diligence
generationExamples.response: RULE "High-Risk-EDD" IF risk_score > 70 THEN REQUIRE enhanced_due_diligence AND NOTIFY compliance_team

attributes.name: jurisdiction
attributes.description: The regulatory jurisdiction under which the entity operates.

KYC.description: Primary regulatory jurisdiction for compliance and reporting requirements.

generationExamples.response: RULE "Jurisdiction-KYC" IF jurisdiction == 'EU' THEN REQUIRE gdpr_consent AND mifid_classification

TaxReporting.description: Tax jurisdiction for CRS and FATCA reporting purposes.

description: Configuration for trade settlement and clearing system integration.

attributes.name: trade_amount
attributes.description: The notional amount of the trade in base currency.

attributes.name: settlement_date
attributes.description: The date when the trade is scheduled to settle.

attributes.name: counterparty_name
attributes.description: The name of the trading counterparty.
